name: MPDC
description:
MPDC is a multiplayer prototype in active development.

View the Trello Roadmap: https://trello.com/b/wwkXiuFC

It currently features three classes, each with their own weapon:

  • Knight - Sword (Melee combat)
  • Ranger - Bow (Mid-range, arrows drop)
  • Wizard - Staff (Long range)

Pickups:

  • Red - Full Heal
  • Green - Speed Boost

Game Modes:

  • Free For All (Deathmatch) - currently in development
  • Last One Standing (Battle Royale) - planned
  • Survival (Wave based PvE) - pending server AI

Planned Features:

  • Server Controlled Enemy AI

Long Term Ideas:

  • Procedurally generated dungeons
  • Player/Character progression
  • Survival Leader boards
  • Account System
  • Over world

Controls

  • WASD to move
  • Left click to attack
  • 1 / 2 / 3 to switch class
  • F1 to set networked player name
  • Tab to show scoreboard

I stream development live on Twitch, and post updates to Twitter

I plan on hosting public play tests Friday nights (EST), if you are interested in participating, providing feedback, or seeing updates about the game please join our Discord server.

Currently this is a solo development project, but I am looking for help! If you're interested in joining the team please post in #join-the-team on Discord.

Known Issue: The application MPDC.exe throws a warning from Microsoft Dfender SmartScreen about being an unrecognized app. I promise there's no funny business here.
